title: Lake Jackson Texas Police - Arrest of Rolando Reyes by Officer Johnny Cagle and Officer Mendoza - Officer Johnny Cagle's Emails

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Lake Jackson Texas Police - Arrest of Rolando Reyes by Officer Johnny Cagle and Officer Mendoza - Officer Johnny Cagle's Emails
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any email controlled, maintained or archived by the Lake Jackson Police Department or the City of  Lake Jackson, TX having the following requirements:

1) Any and all email(s) sent by or received by Officer Johnny Cagle.
2) Date range: Between March 1, 2022 to March 31, 2022.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Stuart Martin

title: Texas City Police - Arrest of Christopher Shull by Officer Scott Harrell - Copy of Citation Issued

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Texas City Police - Arrest of Christopher Shull by Officer Scott Harrell - Copy of Citation Issued
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1)  A copy of Citation 0386221-1 issued to Christopher Shull.
2)  A copy of Officer Scott Harrell's notes related to Citation 0386221-1

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Stuart Martin
